name: Code: Mortal

skills.name: Code: Mortal
skills.detail: Apply 5% Special Attack [Human] effect to the engraved Card

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Human
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Human]

comment: Like a knot coming undone, it begins to unravel from the point of contact.

name: Code: Brute

skills.name: Code: Brute
skills.detail: Apply 5% Special Attack [Wild Beasts] effect to the engraved Card

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Wild Beasts
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Wild Beast]

comment: Upon hearing the beast's roar, victory shall be in your grasp.

name: Code: Corpse

skills.name: Code: Corpse
skills.detail: Apply 5% Special Attack [Undead] effect to the engraved Card

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Undead
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Undead]

comment: The sound of one's fellows, beating down in the bowels of the earth. This tune calls forth the dead.

name: Code: Evil

skills.name: Code: Evil
skills.detail: Apply 5% Special Attack [Demonic] effect to the engraved Card

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Demonic
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Demonic]

comment: Temptation takes one by the hand. Darkness is its ultimate destination.

name: Code: Nimbus

skills.name: Code: Nimbus
skills.detail: Apply 5% Special Attack [Divine] effect to the engraved Card

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Divine
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Divine]

comment: O light of the heavens, rain down upon me as I am anointed with your blessing.

name: Code: Bless

skills.name: Code: Bless
skills.detail: Recover 100 HP for yourself when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment: Give thanks to the gentle rain. Be grateful for the water's soothing touch.

name: Code: Glitter

skills.name: Code: Glitter
skills.detail: Increase C. Star Drop Rate by 20% for the engraved Card

buffs.name: C. Star Drop Rate Up
buffs.detail: Increase C. Star drop rate

comment: A bountiful harvest leads to blessings. Dazzling, glittering...as you wish.

name: Code: Burst

skills.name: Code: Burst
skills.detail: Increase Critical Strength by 3% for the engraved Card

buffs.name: Critical Up
buffs.detail: Increase Critical Hit damage

comment: To begin, stand resolute. Take aim and bring it down.

name: Code: Focus

skills.name: Code: Focus
skills.detail: Increase C. Star Gather Rate by 25% for the engraved Card

buffs.name: C. Star Gather Up
buffs.detail: Increase C. Star gather rate

comment: Come, gather around. Brilliance is at your fingertips.

name: Code: Cure

skills.name: Code: Cure
skills.detail: Remove one Poison, Curse, or Burn status effect from yourself when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment: The shackles have fallen away, along with all peace of mind.

name: Lucky Beast

skills.name: Lucky Beast
skills.detail: Recover 200 HP for yourself when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment: "Fou! Foufoufooou!!!" (Translation: Put me on a Command Card of your choice!)

name: First Servant

skills.name: First Servant
skills.detail: Apply Damage Cut 300 (1 time, 1 turn) for yourself when the engraved Card is used to attack

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment: "So this is the new Servant support spell...a Command Code. It's wonderful, Senpai! Putting it on a Command Card will enable a variety of effects!"

name: Armament of Victory

skills.name: Armament of Victory
skills.detail: Increase C. Star Gather Rate by 100% on the Card that is engraved

buffs.name: C. Star Gather Up
buffs.detail: Increase C. Star gather rate

comment: Its name means the sword that grants victory. It's said that the light it emits contains the people's wishes.

name: Crest of Humanity

skills.name: Crest of Humanity
skills.detail: Increase C. Star Drop Rate by 30% on the Card that is engraved

buffs.name: C. Star Drop Rate Up
buffs.detail: Increase C. Star drop rate

comment: Chaldea, The Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity. We safeguard the future of mankind. Our wish is for the path we take to be the right one.

name: Red Gem Lady's Command Seal

skills.name: Red Gem Lady's Command Seal
skills.detail: Increase Critical Strength by 10% to the engraved Card

buffs.name: Critical Up
buffs.detail: Increase Critical Hit damage

comment:
The magical seal mark of a certain Master.
It has the image of a gem that is filled with magical energy.

name: God-Binding Chain

skills.name: God-Binding Chain
skills.detail: Apply 15% Special Attack [Divine] effect to the engraved Card

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Divine
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Divine]

comment: A chain that was said to have once bound the Bull of Heaven. They say that the greater the target's Divinity, the more constrictive the chain becomes.

name: Wedge of the Heavens

skills.name: Wedge of the Heavens
skills.detail: Apply 20% Special Attack [Servant] effect to the engraved Card (Servants with Power of the Star are immune to the Special Attack)

buffs.name: Strength Up [Servant]
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt to [Servants] (Servants with Power of the Star are immune to the Special Attack)

comment:
"Engravings are a symbol of power. It is only sensible to choose me as a symbol.
Make use of this power as you like!"

name: White Vessel's Command Seal

skills.name: White Vessel's Command Seal
skills.detail: Remove 1 Debuff from yourself when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment:
A certain Master's Command Seal.
It bears the image of a small chalice.

name: Dragon-Slayer's Sword

skills.name: Dragon-Slayer's Sword
skills.detail: Increase the engraved Card's Critical Strength against [Dragon] enemies by 25%

buffs.name: Critical Strengh Up [Dragon]
buffs.detail: Increase Critical Hit damage against [Dragon]

comment:
A longsword of twilight infused with magical energy from the Age of Gods.
It can turn into a sacred sword or a demonic sword, depending on its wielder.

name: Demonic Dragon of Twilight

skills.name: Demonic Dragon of Twilight
skills.detail: Apply 20% Special Attack [Dragon] effect to the engraved Card

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Dragon
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Dragon]

comment: "Master, I will entrust my back to you. In return, should you ever come against an obstacle, I will open the path for you with this blade."

name: Love Hunter

skills.name: Love Hunter
skills.detail: Apply Sure Hit to the engraved Card

buffs.name: Sure Hit
buffs.detail: Ignore Evade and deal ATK damage

comment:
"The legendary hunter of myth, and just an overall good-looking guy who's a big hit with the ladies.

Yep, that's me. Orion the superman.
Other than the fact that I accidentally pierced the heart of a goddess, I'm the perfect love hunter...heh heh.

So don't hesitate to pair me with any of the cute Servant girls!

Oh, but that aside, don't waste your time looking up the meaning of my name, okay?"

name: The Dark Disciple's Command Seal

skills.name: The Dark Disciple's Command Seal
skills.detail: Remove one DEF Up buff on a single enemy when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment: A certain Master's magical seal. It bears an image of the martial arts power that dwells within the Master's body.

name: Sword of Beginning and End

skills.name: Sword of Beginning and End
skills.detail: Increase damage by 1000 when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Damage Plus
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt

comment: The sword mentioned in the story of the one who established the foundation of modern alchemy. Parents and masters often offer it as a celebration of reaching adulthood.

name: The Holy Night's Aurora

skills.name: The Holy Night's Aurora
skills.detail: Gain 4 C. Stars when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment:
I will neither compromise nor make exceptions regarding the three rules for what makes good children. Not even at Christmas.

First, they must remain dignified when meeting Santa.
Second, they must reward Santa with their smiles.
Third, they must send Santa off with gratitude.

And one final thing: they must await next Christmas with hope.

Reindeer and I shall only visit those who can follow those rules. Our gifts may be random, but we will tolerate no complaints.

name: Demonic Beast of the Forest

skills.name: Demonic Beast of the Forest
skills.detail: Inflict Curse (500 damage, 3 turns) to a single enemy when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment:
A giant demonic beast let loose into the wild thanks to the disrespect shown by a certain king.
Its appearance is the embodiment of divine punishment from the moon goddess.

name: Mirror of Eight Leaves

skills.name: Mirror of Eight Leaves
skills.detail: Apply Immobilize Immune (1 time, 2 turns) to yourself when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment:
A truly divine treasure among treasures of the underworld, powerful enough to revive the dead.
Due to its owner, its performance is limited to only a fraction of its full potential.

name: Good Wife, Wise Fox

skills.name: Good Wife, Wise Fox
skills.detail: Increase HP Recovery amount by 50% (1 time, 2 turns) for yourself when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment:
"You've done a terrific job today☆
Would you like a meal first? Or would you like a bath first?
Or perhaps you would like an e-v-e-n-t♡
As your reliable fox shrine maiden, I will support you however I can, Master!"

name: The Disillusioned Blossom's Command Seal

skills.name: The Disillusioned Blossom's Command Seal
skills.detail: Remove one ATK Up buff on a single enemy + Recover 100 HP for yourself when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment:
The magical seal mark of a certain Master.
It bears the image of a flower that represents spring.

name: Dove Report

skills.name: Dove Report
skills.detail: Remove one Critical Strength Up state & when successfully removed, decrease Critical Rate by 10% (3 turns) for one enemy when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment: A dark-coated dove that lives in the floating gardens. They work as messengers reporting about various occurrences during the season of love. Though they are familiars, they sometimes reveal the secrets of their own master. Coo-coo-poh.

name: Star-Severing Evil Sacred Sword

skills.name: Star-Severing Evil Sacred Sword
skills.detail: Increase Critical Strength against [Saber] class by 25% for the engraved Card

buffs.name: Critical Strength Up (Saber)
buffs.detail: Increase Critical Hit damage to (Saber) Class enemies

comment:
The sword of darkness said to slice through even five-star rated ☆s. Whether this is true or not is unclear, but through the guidance of Alternium, the sword became the ultimate final weapon for the Dark R.O.U.N.D.S. that possesses incredible power.

Also, it can be purchased online, but rumors of this sword being a favorite of a cute, mysterious literature aficionado knight circulated, causing the sword to sell for a premium.

name: Bride of the White Rose

skills.name: Bride of the White Rose
skills.detail: Recover 200 HP for all allies when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment: "If you are to take a supreme sword like myself as your bride, then the sheath must also be superb as well. Though, some may differ in interpreting what 'superb' means here, since there are a great many things one might be proud of! Master, do not hold back. Tell me your dreams. I exist to be wielded to grant those dreams. Heh. My love is more fiery than a dragon's breath. Prepare yourself...and make use of me!"

name: BB Slots

skills.name: BB Slots
skills.detail: Activate various random effects <Gain 5 C. Stars, Restore 500 HP, or Increase Debuff Resist by 10% (1 turn) for yourself> when attacking with the engraved Card

buffs.name: Command Code Bonus Attack Effect
buffs.detail: An additional effect is granted when attacking with the engraved Command Card.

comment:
Whether one is powerful or weak...
Lucky or unlucky...
Everyone is treated equally.

The slot machine the little devil made...

...may just be the Cute but Curse-happy girl's Clumsy way of expressing her love.
Just maybe...
